project.title: FRAGMNT
project.about: Fragmnt is a mobile app for interactive musical ambiences.

concept.p1: The concept is not based on a streaming catalog, nor on playlists.
concept.p2: Each fragmnt contains original music, designed to be modulated and recombined within the application.
concept.objective: Objective: create infinite variations, while keeping a strong musical identity.

howItWorks.title: How it works?
howItWorks.step1: Choose a fragmnt (neo classic, lofi, chill house, ambient...)
howItWorks.step2: Start listening: the music evolves naturally, over time
howItWorks.step3: Adjust if needed: 2–3 parameters to vary space, intensity, balance

noLoop.title: It doesn't go in circles
noLoop.text: A continuous composition, designed to last. Not a suite of tracks.

discrete.title: Discrete interactivity
discrete.text: A parameter can be adjusted, or a slight variation triggered, without breaking the flow.

composed.title: Composed, not generic
composed.text: Original music packs, created with musicians and sound designers. Designed from the start for interactivity.

visuals.title: Visual scenes
visuals.p1: Each scene will also have a visual universe, made with Unity, as an extension of the music.
visuals.p2: Living dioramas, with animations and micro-interactions inspired by video games.

influences.title: Influences
influences.music: Music: Brian Eno, Kiasmo, Ólafur Arnalds, Bonobo, Hermanos Gutiérrez, Hania Rani, Max Richter, Nils Frahm…
influences.universe: Universe: Monument Valley, Breath of the Wild.
